wordpressPage.title: Careers
wordpressPage.content:
We’re always looking for new talent to take this shit to the next level.

Mobile Developer, iOS or Android

Here are some of the qualities we are looking for:

  • Several years experience coding in Objective C, Swift or Java
  • Experience with Android Studio or Xcode
  • An interest in databases and some SQL
  • Track record of teaching, blogging and public speaking is a
  • Staying current with development, tools and news in the community

Web Developer

  • Here are some of the qualities we are looking for:
  • Several years experience coding in HTML5/JavaScript, Angular & CSS
  • Experience with IntelliJ or any other JetBrains IDE
  • An interest in databases and some SQL experience
  • Desire to learn and code in Dart and Angular Dart
  • Some exposure to, or the ability to quickly learn to interact with the iOS and Android SDKs
  • Track record of teaching, blogging and public speaking is a plus
  • Staying current with development, tools and news in the community
